Description
The Cremona SVA-175 viola offers all of the performance characteristics, playability and durability a beginning violist could want. The SVA-175 is constructed of select tonewoods and quality workmanship for the finest possible tone, and is topped off with all NAFME / Music Educators National Conference-approved specifications. Each instrument has been upgraded to include a beautiful, translucent, warm brown finish which lets the grain show through. It is crafted to be just as pleasing to the eye as it is to the ear. To complete these outfits, the SVA-175 has been upgraded to include a Travelite oblong viola case with built-in hygrometer, and an exceptional LB-13 J. La Salle octagonal Brazilwood bow with ebony frog and genuine unbleached horsehair.

Specifications
Name: Cremona SVA-175
Size: 4/4
Top: Select solid spruce
Back and Sides: Solid maple
Finish: Antique translucent brown lacquer
Neck: Oiled solid maple
Fingerboard: Polished ebony
Bow: LB-13V
Tailpiece: Aluminum with four built-in fine tuners
Strings: D'Addario Prelude
Case: Standard Travelite TL-33V oblong case with two bow holders and hygrometer
Pricing: RM100 per month

Pricing Explanation
As a student model, the SVA-175 viola is not too expensive to rent at only RM100 a month, very ideal for practice and such. Though in terms of exams, it is not advised to rent this instrument as the difference in quality is quite high. The base price of this instrument is USD495 or RM2025.

Disclaimer
When in possession of the instrument, the user holds full responsibility for what happens to the instrument. If the instrument rented is in anyway damaged, the customer will have to replace said instrument for the rental service. Late returners of the instrument would be issued a warning in a week, and will be subjegated to a RM150 late fee. For every subsequent week, another RM150 would be added.
